knowledge: Expert JavaScript: Deep understanding of JavaScript (ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, closures, etc.)
Mastery of Multiple Frameworks:  Proficiency in at least two major front-end frameworks (React, Vue.js, Angular) and ability to quickly learn new ones
Advanced Back-End Skills: Strong experience with server-side development, including API design (REST, GraphQL), security best practices, and performance optimization
Database Expertise:  Proficient with both SQL and NoSQL databases, including data modeling, query optimization, and database administration
DevOps Practices: Experience with CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), and infrastructure automation
Testing Methodologies:  Mastery of various testing techniques (unit, integration, E2E, performance) and test-driven development (TDD)
Architecture and Design Patterns:  Ability to design and implement complex software architectures, including microservices, and apply appropriate design patterns
Security Best Practices:  Deep understanding of security vulnerabilities and how to mitigate them, including authentication, authorization, and data validation
Performance Optimization:  Expertise in optimizing both front-end and back-end performance, including caching strategies, code optimization, and database tuning
Problem-Solving and Critical Thinking:  Ability to analyze complex problems, identify root causes, and develop effective solutions
Technical Leadership:  Mentoring junior developers, providing technical guidance, and influencing technical decisions
Communication and Collaboration:  Excellent communication and collaboration skills, both within the team and with stakeholders
Project Management:  Experience managing projects, including planning, execution, and delivery
certificates: Degree: Master of Science in Computer Science, Stanford University
Course: Advanced Software Architecture, MIT OpenCourseware
Course: Cloud-Native Application Development, Udemy
Course: Secure Coding Practices, SANS Institute
Language: English

knowledge: JavaScript Frameworks: Basic understanding of one or more (React, Vue.js, Angular)
Back-End Basics: Understanding of server-side principles
Server-Side Language: Familiarity with at least one (e.g., Python, Node.js, Java, PHP)
Databases: Basic SQL knowledge, introduction to NoSQL
API Interaction: Understanding of RESTful APIs
Version Control: Git and GitHub/GitLab basics
Basic Testing: Unit and integration testing concepts
Problem-Solving: Ability to analyze and solve coding challenges
Learning Agility: Eagerness to learn new technologies and adapt quickly
Communication: Effective communication within a team
Collaboration: Ability to work effectively with others
